summary: This is an email chain regarding the assignment and duty schedule of an 'I/M companion' (likely Inmate Companion) for Jeffrey Epstein from July 23-24, 2019, sent on August 12, 2019. It appears to be internal staff communication about monitoring arrangements.

events.title: I/M Companion Duty Start
events.description: An I/M companion (Inmate Companion) assumed duties for monitoring Jeffrey Epstein beginning at 7:00 am.

events.title: I/M Companion Duty End
events.description: The I/M companion's duty period ended at 8:45 am.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, referencing a duty schedule from July 23-24, 2019.
It details the timing (7:00 am to 8:45 am the next day) for an 'I/M companion' assigned to monitor Jeffrey Epstein.
The term 'I/M companion' likely stands for 'Inmate Companion', a role assigned for suicide watch or constant observation in a correctional setting.
The duty period referenced occurred approximately three weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The communication appears to be a routine administrative record of staff assignments related to Epstein's incarceration.
